job_description:
• Experience in lot tracking, dispatching, or operations support in a semiconductor/clean room environment.
• Strong verbal and written communication skills and basic proficiency in Microsoft Office tools.
• Ability to work 12-hour shifts (day or night), with flexibility to meet business needs.
• Process Technician Experience in a manufacturing plant environment or equivalent Some college coursework preferred.
• Less than 2 years Intern - Technician, ProcessBoise, Idaho, United States of America + 2 morePosted a month ago Intern - Process TechnicianManassas, Virginia, United States of AmericaPosted 3 days ago.
• Familiarity with semiconductor manufacturing processes and production flow concepts.
• Proven ability to resolve any bottlenecks in manufacturing line.
• Support environmental, health, safety, and security protocols and maintain training certifications.
